alert.note: Alert for Benton; Decatur; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henderson, south central Benton and northern Decatur Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Natchez Trace State Forest, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Darden, Perryville, Busseltown, Jeannette, Wilkinstown, Mount Tabor, Sugar Tree, Garrett, Beacon, Hickory Forks, Cozette, Bible Hill and Chesterfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
